description:
See for instance http://paste.ubuntu.com/7192574/

+---------------+-----------+-------------+---------+
| Ip            | Server Id | Fixed Ip    | Pool    |
+---------------+-----------+-------------+---------+
| 138.35.77.109 |           | -           | ext-net |
| 138.35.77.50  |           | -           | ext-net |
| 138.35.77.36  |           | -           | ext-net |

This appears to be a regression - its breaking nodepool (see bug 1301111 for context) and we used to have this working before we recently upgraded our nova.
title: nova floating-ip-list has blank server id field
